title: Lifts shall not normally communicate with the basement
clause_text: Lifts shall not normally communicate with the basement. However, one of the lifts may be permitted to reach the basement level provided the lift lobby at each basement level shall be pressurized and separated from the rest of the basement areas, by a smoke-actuated fire resisting door of two hoursâ€™ fire resistance. These doors can also be kept in hold-open position by an electro-magnetic device to be linked with a smoke detector.
